  1. Get the last n emails from inbox (Gmail) — Retrieves the most recent n email messages from the user's Gmail inbo
agents.prompt: check my last n emails and summarize them

endpoints.summary: Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate a summary of their content

query_parameters.name: n
query_parameters.description: Number of recent emails to retrieve and summarize

agents.task_description:
Task: check my last n emails and summarize them
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Get the last n emails from inbox (Gmail) — Retrieves the most recent n email messages from the user's Gmail inbox
  2. Extract email content and metadata from each email (Gmail) — Gets the subject, sender, date, and body content for each of the retrieved emails
  3. Summarize the emails into a coherent overview — Creates a summary text highlighting key topics, senders, and important information from all the emails
Endpoint 0: POST /summarize-recent-emails — Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate a summary of their content
Services: Gmail
Parameters:
- n (int, query, endpoint 0): Specifies how many of the most recent emails to fetch for summarization

agents.description:
Task: When a Trello card moves to Done, post a summary to Slack
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Set up a webhook or monitor for card movements in Trello (Trello) — Establish trigger to detect
agents.prompt: When a Trello card moves to Done, post a summary to Slack

endpoints.summary: Post a summary to Slack when a Trello card moves to Done status

path_parameters.name: card_id
path_parameters.description: ID of the Trello card that moved to Done

agents.task_description:
Task: When a Trello card moves to Done, post a summary to Slack
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Set up a webhook or monitor for card movements in Trello (Trello) — Establish trigger to detect when any card is moved to the 'Done' list
  2. Get the card details when moved to Done (Trello) — Fetch card information including name, description, members, due date, and other relevant details
  3. Generate a summary of the completed card (Trello) — Create a concise summary text containing key card information for posting
  4. Post the card summary message to Slack (Slack) — Send the formatted summary to the designated Slack channel
Endpoint 0: POST /card-done-to-slack — Post a summary to Slack when a Trello card moves to Done status
Services: Trello, Slack
Parameters:
- card_id (str, path, endpoint 0): Identifies the specific card to get details for the summary
- slack_channel (str, body, endpoint 1): Destination for posting the card summary message

agents.prompt: create an agent which summarizes my last n emails

endpoints.summary: Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate an AI summary of their contents

body_parameters.name: n
body_parameters.description: Number of recent emails to summarize

agents.task_description:
Task: create an agent which summarizes my last n emails
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Connect to Gmail account (Gmail) — Establish authentication and connection to access Gmail data
  2. Get the last n emails from inbox (Gmail) — Retrieve the specified number of most recent emails with their content, subject, sender, and date
  3. Extract email content and metadata (Gmail) — Parse each email to get subject, sender, date, and body text for processing
  4. Summarize the collection of emails — Generate a concise summary covering key topics, important information, and overall themes from the emails
  5. Format and present the summary — Structure the summary in a readable format with key insights and important details highlighted
Endpoint 0: POST /summarize-emails — Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate an AI summary of their contents
Services: Gmail
Parameters:
- n (int, body, endpoint 0): Specifies how many of the most recent emails to retrieve and summarize
